### PHASE 2: QUANTUM PROJECT ANALYSIS (30-60 seconds)

Execute all analysis patterns simultaneously across 12 parallel threads:

#### 2.1 File System Quantum Scan

```typescript
const fileAnalysis = await quantumFileScanner.scanProject({
  rootPath: process.cwd(),
  excludePatterns: [
    "node_modules/**",
    ".next/**",
    ".git/**",
    "coverage/**",
    "dist/**",
    "build/**",
  ],
  includeHidden: false,
  parallelization: 12,
  gpuAcceleration: true,
});
```

#### 2.2 Dependency Graph Manifestation

```typescript
const dependencyGraph = await quantumDependencyMapper.mapAllRelationships({
  fileList: fileAnalysis.allFiles,
  analysisDepth: "QUANTUM_COMPLETE",
  includeTypes: ["import", "require", "dynamic-import", "asset-reference"],
  preserveAgriculturalLinks: true,
});
```

#### 2.3 Agricultural Consciousness Detection

```typescript
const agriculturalFiles = await farmingPatternDetector.scan({
  files: fileAnalysis.allFiles,
  patterns: [
    /farm|farmer|crop|harvest|soil|plant|grow|season/i,
    /agricultural|biodynamic|organic/i,
    /divine.*farm|quantum.*agricultural/i,
  ],
  consciousness: "DEEP_ANALYSIS",
});
```

#### 2.4 Divine Pattern Validation

```typescript
const divinePatterns = await divinePatternValidator.scan({
  files: fileAnalysis.allFiles,
  patterns: [
    /quantum|divine|consciousness|manifest|reality/i,
    /holographic|fractal|temporal/i,
    /enlightening|ascension|transcendence/i,
  ],
});
```

#### 2.5 Build Artifact Identification

```typescript
const buildArtifacts = await buildArtifactDetector.identify({
  files: fileAnalysis.allFiles,
  types: ["generated", "compiled", "bundled", "cached"],
  checkGitignore: true,
});
```

#### 2.6 Dead Code Detection

```typescript
const deadCode = await deadCodeHunter.findUnused({
  files: fileAnalysis.sourceFiles,
  dependencyGraph,
  entryPoints: [
    "src/app/layout.tsx",
    "src/app/page.tsx",
    "src/app/api/**/*.ts",
  ],
  preserveTests: true,
  preserveDocs: true,
});
```

### PHASE 3: CLEANUP PLANNING (10-20 seconds)

```typescript
const cleanupPlan = await cleanupOrchestrator.generatePlan({
  analysis: {
    fileAnalysis,
    dependencyGraph,
    agriculturalFiles,
    divinePatterns,
    buildArtifacts,
    deadCode,
  },

  rules: {
    // Safety rules
    preserveAgriculturalConsciousness: true,
    preserveDivinePatterns: true,
    respectGitignore: true,
    verifyBeforeDeletion: true,

    // Confidence thresholds
    safeToDelete: 95, // 95%+ confidence
    reviewNeeded: 70, // 70-94% confidence
    manualReview: 50, // 50-69% confidence

    // Cleanup targets
    cleanBuildArtifacts: true,
    cleanTempFiles: true,
    cleanUnusedDependencies: true,
    cleanDeadCode: true,
    cleanEmptyDirectories: true,

    // Preservation rules
    preserveTests: true,
    preserveDocs: true,
    preserveConfig: true,
    preserveGitFiles: true,
  },
});
```

### PHASE 4: CATEGORIZATION & REPORTING

```typescript
const report = await enlighteningReporter.generate({
  plan: cleanupPlan,
  categories: {
    divine: cleanupPlan.filter((f) => f.confidence >= 95),
    quantum: cleanupPlan.filter((f) => f.confidence >= 70 && f.confidence < 95),
    agricultural: cleanupPlan.filter(
      (f) => f.confidence >= 50 && f.confidence < 70
    ),
    sacred: cleanupPlan.filter((f) => f.confidence < 50),
  },

  metrics: {
    totalFiles: fileAnalysis.allFiles.length,
    agriculturalFiles: agriculturalFiles.length,
    divinePatterns: divinePatterns.length,
    potentialDeletions: cleanupPlan.length,
    totalSizeReduction: calculateTotalSize(cleanupPlan),
    estimatedBuildTimeImprovement: estimateBuildImprovement(cleanupPlan),
  },
});
```

## ðŸ”§ CUSTOMIZATION PARAMETERS

```typescript
interface CleanupConfiguration {
  // Preservation rules
  preservePatterns: string[];
  protectedDirectories: string[];

  // Confidence thresholds (0-100)
  divineThreshold: number; // Default: 95
  quantumThreshold: number; // Default: 70
  agriculturalThreshold: number; // Default: 50

  // Cleanup targets
  cleanupTargets: {
    buildArtifacts: boolean;
    tempFiles: boolean;
    deadCode: boolean;
    unusedDeps: boolean;
    emptyDirs: boolean;
  };

  // Hardware optimization
  parallelization: number; // Default: 12 (HP OMEN)
  gpuAcceleration: boolean; // Default: true (RTX 2070)
  maxMemory: string; // Default: "32GB"
}
```
